scripts.dev: node  --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' src/index.ts
scripts.dev:watch: nodemon --exec "node  --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from \"node:module\"; import { pathToFileURL } from \"node:url\"; register(\"ts-node/esm\", pathToFileURL(\"./\"));'" src/index.ts
scripts.build:simple: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'prisma generate && tsc && cp -r src/generated dist/src/ && cp .env dist/'
scripts.seed: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' prisma/seed.ts
scripts.demo-seed: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));' prisma/demo-seed.ts
scripts.db:reset-and-seed: npx prisma migrate reset --force && npm run seed
